content.description: Sit Start on the crack. Pull a big move to a crimp and work across the face to the arete on the left side of the boulder. Top out from there. Super cool movement for an easy problem.

Fun little scramble up the sloped side. Same start as “Hidden in Plain Sight”. Mantle the micro boulder, head to the right, over the crack, use the mini jugs/crimps to work your way up. Top out on top of the boulder. Stand tall and enjoy the view!
content.protection: Crash pads for best practice, but a spotter should be fine.

content.description: Stand Start on the obvious side pulling jugs. Climb the face. Don't fall on your face.

Standing start using obvious holds. Right leg smears just above the crack. Work your way up, with your left foot finally connecting with a thin flake near the arrete. Work your way to better hands and hook your left foot - allowing for higher hand holds. Cake from there.
content.location: Left of erratic behavior, right of he’s just around the corner.

content.description: Fierce microboulder. Sit start on the obvious jug on the detached block. Stay low to and work along the lip. Once you get to the horn, top er' out. The most fun you can have two feet off the ground.
content.location: Lip of the detached block next to the main boulder.

content.description: Short and powerful movement up the aerete. The opposing detached block is off.
content.location: Squat/stand start on two obvious crimps on the knifes edge

content.description: A kid on top of the boulder informed me that "its much easier to get on top from the other side".
content.location: Right up the middle of the tallest part.Start matching on a crimp. The crack and everything under it is off!Don't bail left. Go straight up the face

content.description: This hitch hiking glacial erratic snagged a ride from somewhere in Minnestota and ended up here. As far as we know, its the largest of its kind in the state. The short approach, impeccable landings, scenic environment and unique rock features make Waldo's Rock Park a quality place to come and run some laps on fun problems.
